entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac Manouane East 1:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: -7.7°C
Humidity: 59 %
Dewpoint: -14.3°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
